body: I HATE Krillin. But I REALLY Wish it was Tien cucking him seeing as he saved 18's Ass by holding off imperfect Cell, n not useless old man Roshi lmfao like dafuq y. Yajirobe cucking Krillin would be preferable>Roshi.

@ITS FAPPABLE [And who in the world deserves ntr bro] Uhh. Plenty. There are some ppl who hate Issei from DxD and say he doesn't deserve his harem. I personally don't agree with that. But there are people like that. But what I can definitely tell you is that I personally think that certain other harem protags like Rito from To Love Ru certainly doesn't deserve his harem. Same with that spineless weak MC from Sekirei. So there are plenty of ppl who actually deserve to be NTR'd, esp ones that take the waifus' love around them for granted. Why don't you watch Darling in the Franxx and then get back to me on that? Just because you haven't met some chars yet who deserve it, doesn't mean they don't exist. Btw you wanna talk about how Vegeta stolen Bulma from Yamcha? Toriyama himself practiced NTR, Vegeta was an asshat (for a long time) compared to Yamcha, and yet many ppl never said shit. And yet here we are with Krillin being stolen from and now ppl are trying to cry foul? Such hypocrisy.
Maldito sea Roshi follando a mi mujer de nuevo KAPPA

@ゆりゆり.true that bruh. In the end it was Toriyama's bad writing that resulted in Krilin being weaker the longer the series went on.But saying he deserves it? Nah fam. In OG dragon ball he was a nice and likeable character and perhaps till the start of cell saga in dbz. And who in the world deserves ntr bro. Chill. Anyway, peace

@Gigglestick Maybe it's because he was a useless sack of shit of a Z Fighter before Super??? DB, DBZ, and even GT existed long before Super ever came out. It don't matter if he was the "strongest human fighter", esp when you got various alien races that blows the entire human race out of the water altogether. Japan remembers. USA remembers. Every DBZ fans all over remembers. He will never escape his dark past, no matter how much Toriyama throws him a fucking bone now. That and combined with him landing one of the hottest DBZ girls in the series? Yeah no. He deserves it.
